user_question: What are the specs of Samsung Galaxy M17?
description: User wants complete specifications of a single phone.
sql_schema: SELECT * FROM samsung_phones WHERE name ILIKE '%Samsung Galaxy M17%' LIMIT 1;

user_question: Compare Samsung Galaxy M17 and Samsung Galaxy F07 for camera performance.
description: User wants to compare main and selfie camera features.
sql_schema: SELECT name, main_camera, main_camera_features, main_camera_video, selfie_camera, selfie_camera_features, selfie_camera_video FROM samsung_phones WHERE name ILIKE '%Samsung Galaxy M17%' OR name ILIKE '%Samsung Galaxy F07%';

user_question: Compare Samsung Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra and Samsung Galaxy Tab S11 for display and battery.
description: User wants to compare tablet display sizes and battery specs.
sql_schema: SELECT name, display_type, display_size, display_resolution, battery_type, battery_charging FROM samsung_phones WHERE name ILIKE '%Samsung Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra%' OR name ILIKE '%Samsung Galaxy Tab S11%';

user_question: Compare Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra, Samsung Galaxy S25+, and Samsung Galaxy S25 for camera and performance.
description: User wants to compare multiple phones for camera and chipset specs.
sql_schema: SELECT name, main_camera, main_camera_features, main_camera_video, platform_chipset, platform_cpu, platform_gpu FROM samsung_phones WHERE name ILIKE '%Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra%' OR name ILIKE '%Samsung Galaxy S25+%' OR name ILIKE '%Samsung Galaxy S25%';

user_question: List Samsung Galaxy F36, Samsung Galaxy F56, and Samsung Galaxy F16 with 5G support.
description: User wants 5G enabled phones from F-series.
sql_schema: SELECT name, network_5g_bands, misc_price FROM samsung_phones WHERE (name ILIKE '%Samsung Galaxy F36%' OR name ILIKE '%Samsung Galaxy F56%' OR name ILIKE '%Samsung Galaxy F16%') AND network_5g_bands IS NOT NULL AND network_5g_bands != '';

user_question: Compare Samsung Galaxy A56, Samsung Galaxy A36, Samsung Galaxy A26 for price and memory.
description: User wants to compare A-series phones for RAM, storage, and price.
sql_schema: SELECT name, memory_internal, memory_card_slot, misc_price FROM samsung_phones WHERE name ILIKE '%Samsung Galaxy A56%' OR name ILIKE '%Samsung Galaxy A36%' OR name ILIKE '%Samsung Galaxy A26%';

user_question: Find the most affordable Samsung Galaxy M16, M06, and M36 phones.
description: User wants cheapest phones from M-series.
sql_schema: SELECT name, misc_price FROM samsung_phones WHERE name ILIKE '%Samsung Galaxy M16%' OR name ILIKE '%Samsung Galaxy M06%' OR name ILIKE '%Samsung Galaxy M36%' ORDER BY CAST(REGEXP_REPLACE(misc_price, '[^0-9]', '', 'g') AS INTEGER) ASC LIMIT 5;

user_question: What are the full specs of Galaxy F16?
description: User wants complete specifications of Samsung Galaxy F16 model.
sql_schema: SELECT * FROM samsung_phones WHERE name ILIKE '%Galaxy F16%' LIMIT 1;

user_question: What are the full specs of Galaxy S25?
description: User wants complete specifications of Samsung Galaxy S25 model.
sql_schema: SELECT * FROM samsung_phones WHERE name ILIKE '%Galaxy S25%' LIMIT 1;

user_question: Show Samsung phones with AMOLED display and 120Hz refresh rate.
description: User wants phones featuring AMOLED screens with 120Hz refresh rate.
sql_schema: SELECT name, display_type, display_refresh_rate, display_size, misc_price FROM samsung_phones WHERE display_type ILIKE '%AMOLED%' AND (display_refresh_rate ILIKE '%120%' OR display_type ILIKE '%120Hz%') ORDER BY launch_announced DESC LIMIT 5;

user_question: List Samsung Galaxy phones launched in 2024 with Snapdragon chipsets.
description: User wants to filter phones released in 2024 powered by Snapdragon chipsets.
sql_schema: SELECT name, platform_chipset, platform_cpu, launch_announced, misc_price FROM samsung_phones WHERE platform_chipset ILIKE '%Snapdragon%' AND launch_announced ILIKE '%2024%' ORDER BY launch_announced DESC LIMIT 5;

user_question: Compare Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra and Galaxy Z Fold6 for display and performance.
description: User wants to compare flagship phones for their display and chipset performance.
sql_schema: SELECT name, display_type, display_size, display_resolution, platform_chipset, platform_cpu, platform_gpu, battery_type FROM samsung_phones WHERE name ILIKE '%Galaxy S25 Ultra%' OR name ILIKE '%Galaxy Z Fold6%';

user_question: Find Samsung phones with battery above 5000mAh and 5G support.
description: User wants high battery capacity phones that also support 5G.
sql_schema: SELECT name, battery_type, battery_charging, network_5g_bands, misc_price FROM samsung_phones WHERE (battery_type ILIKE '%5000%' OR battery_type ILIKE '%6000%') AND network_5g_bands IS NOT NULL AND network_5g_bands <> '' ORDER BY battery_type DESC LIMIT 5;

user_question: Which Samsung Galaxy phones offer best value under $800 with AMOLED display?
description: User wants AMOLED display phones priced below $800.
sql_schema: SELECT name, display_type, misc_price, usd_price FROM ( SELECT name, display_type, misc_price, MIN(CAST(REGEXP_REPLACE(match[1], '[^\d.]', '', 'g') AS DOUBLE PRECISION)) AS usd_price FROM samsung_phones CROSS JOIN LATERAL REGEXP_MATCHES(misc_price, '\$\s*[0-9]+[,.]?[0-9]*', 'g') AS match GROUP BY name, display_type, misc_price ) AS t WHERE usd_price <= 800 AND display_type ILIKE '%AMOLED%' ORDER BY usd_price ASC LIMIT 5;

user_question: Compare Galaxy S25 Ultra and S25+ for photography
sql_schema: SELECT name, main_camera, main_camera_features, main_camera_video, selfie_camera, selfie_camera_features, selfie_camera_video FROM samsung_phones WHERE name ILIKE '%Galaxy S25 Ultra%' OR name ILIKE '%S25+%' LIMIT 5;

user_question: Which Samsung phones have a price under $1000?
sql_schema:
SELECT name, misc_price, usd_price
FROM (
    SELECT
  name,
        misc_price,
        MIN(CAST(REGEXP_REPLACE(match[1], '[^\d.]', '', 'g') AS DOUBLE PRECISION)) AS usd_price
    FROM samsung_phones
    CROSS JOIN LATERAL REGEXP_MATCHES(misc_price, '\$\s*[0-9]+[,.]?[0-9]*', 'g') AS match
    GROUP BY name, misc_price
) AS t
WHERE usd_price <= 1000
ORDER BY usd_price ASC
LIMIT 20;

user_question: Find Samsung phones with the best cameras under $1000.
sql_schema:
SELECT name, main_camera, main_camera_features, misc_price, usd_price
FROM (
    SELECT
        name,
        main_camera,
        main_camera_features,
        misc_price,
        MIN(CAST(REGEXP_REPLACE(match[1], '[^\d.]', '', 'g') AS DOUBLE PRECISION)) AS usd_price
    FROM samsung_phones
    CROSS JOIN LATERAL REGEXP_MATCHES(misc_price, '\$\s*[0-9]+[,.]?[0-9]*', 'g') AS match
    GROUP BY name, main_camera, main_camera_features, misc_price
) AS t
WHERE usd_price <= 1000
ORDER BY main_camera DESC
LIMIT 5;

user_question: Compare Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra and S25 for display and battery under $1000.
sql_schema:
SELECT name, display_size, display_resolution, battery_type, misc_price, usd_price
FROM (
    SELECT
        name,
        display_size,
        display_resolution,
        battery_type,
        misc_price,
        MIN(CAST(REGEXP_REPLACE(match[1], '[^\d.]', '', 'g') AS DOUBLE PRECISION)) AS usd_price
    FROM samsung_phones
    CROSS JOIN LATERAL REGEXP_MATCHES(misc_price, '\$\s*[0-9]+[,.]?[0-9]*', 'g') AS match
    WHERE name ILIKE '%S25 Ultra%' OR name ILIKE '%S25%'
    GROUP BY name, display_size, display_resolution, battery_type, misc_price
) AS t
WHERE usd_price <= 1000
LIMIT 5;

user_question: Which Samsung phones under $1000 have the best selfie cameras?
sql_schema:
SELECT name, selfie_camera, selfie_camera_features, misc_price, usd_price
FROM (
    SELECT
        name,
        selfie_camera,
        selfie_camera_features,
        misc_price,
        MIN(CAST(REGEXP_REPLACE(match[1], '[^\d.]', '', 'g') AS DOUBLE PRECISION)) AS usd_price
    FROM samsung_phones
    CROSS JOIN LATERAL REGEXP_MATCHES(misc_price, '\$\s*[0-9]+[,.]?[0-9]*', 'g') AS match
    GROUP BY name, selfie_camera, selfie_camera_features, misc_price
) AS t
WHERE usd_price <= 1000
ORDER BY selfie_camera DESC
LIMIT 5;

user_question: List the top 5 Samsung phones under $1000 sorted by release date.
sql_schema:
SELECT name, launch_announced, misc_price, usd_price
FROM (
    SELECT
        name,
        launch_announced,
        misc_price,
        MIN(CAST(REGEXP_REPLACE(match[1], '[^\d.]', '', 'g') AS DOUBLE PRECISION)) AS usd_price
    FROM samsung_phones
    CROSS JOIN LATERAL REGEXP_MATCHES(misc_price, '\$\s*[0-9]+[,.]?[0-9]*', 'g') AS match
    GROUP BY name, launch_announced, misc_price
) AS t
WHERE usd_price <= 1000
ORDER BY launch_announced DESC
LIMIT 5;
